forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. A few flurries or snow showers possible. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 27F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers developing during the afternoon. High around 0C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with afternoon snow showers. High 31F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few snow showers scattered about the area in the evening, otherwise a good deal of clouds. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow showers during the evening. Then partly to mostly cloudy overnight. Low around 25F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High -2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 28F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the evening. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers mainly during the evening. Low near 25F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of light snow during the morning will transition to a light wintry mix in the afternoon. High -1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snow and ice accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening giving way to freezing rain overnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%. Snow and ice accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow in the evening will mix with rain at times overnight. Low 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
